Welcome to Battleship!

Get ready to command your fleet in this classic naval strategy game! Your goal is to outwit your opponent and sink their ships before they sink yours. Carefully place your ships on the grid, then take turns guessing their locations and launching attacks. Strategic thinking and luck will determine the victor!

How to Play

1 - Setup

- Each player places their fleet of ships on a 10x10 grid. Ships can be placed horizontally or vertically but cannot overlap or extend beyond the grid.
- Ships come in different sizes, ranging from 2 to 5 squares long.

2 - Gameplay

- Players take turns guessing the coordinates of their opponentâ€™s ships by choosing a grid location.
- If a guessed coordinate contains part of an opponent's ship, it's a hit. If not, it's a miss.

Hits and Misses:

- Hit: The square where the ship is located will be marked in Bright Red.
- Miss: The square where the shot missed will be marked in Steel Blue.
- Destroy: When all squares of a ship have been hit, the ship is destroyed and marked in Dark Red.

Winning the Game:

- The game ends when one player has successfully sunk all of their opponent's ships.
- The player who sinks all opponent ships first is declared the winner.
Enjoy the game and may the best strategist win! (:
